``` {r}
library(Rinvent)
exampleDataR= data.table::as.data.table(exampleDataR)
exampleDataR = exampleDataR[order(location,item,date)]
exampleDataR[,ma5:= maR(sales,4),list(location,item)]
head(exampleDataR,15)
```
